text: François Scellier (born May 7, 1936 in Amiens, Somme) was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2002 to 2017, representing the 6th constituency of the Val-d'Oise department, as a member of the Radical Party. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:People from Amiens Category:Radical Party (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: François Scellier
